body:
Hi Guys,



I am new in grasshopper and honeybee so maybe my questions is quite simple. I am developing a simple parametric room model and i am trying to transform the room into a HBzone.



I have descomposed the whole room into HB surfaces and apply some properties. Then, when i try to create the HBzone a problem appears. The components does not look orage or red but it said that no data is collected.



Could anyone tell me where is the problem? I have attach a file.



Best Regards,

Eduardo

replies.body:
Hi Eduardo! I suggest you to study this example:  [http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=mostaphaRoudsari&amp...;](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=mostaphaRoudsari&fork=hydra_1&id=Surface_by_surface_geometry_preparation_for_energy_simulation_I)[
](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=mostaphaRoudsari&fork=hydra_1&id=Surface_by_surface_geometry_preparation_for_energy_simulation_I) Enclosed you can find the revised version of your file. Have a nice day! Antonello

Thank you vey much Antonello!



It was really usefull your answer and now i can see everything more clear!
